channel.title: I found 3 debit cards today....?
channel.description:
Hey. So as the title says, I found 3 debit cards today. I was going down the sidewalk when I found the first one... And I just stopped waiting for all the cars to go bye, pretending to text someone so I didn't look too suspicious. After all the cars went by, I started looking around for bums. Yes. Bums. I was in an area where homeless people tend to stake out. I didn't want to be interested in a "turkey drop".... After making sure there was nobody around I picked it up. Then I notice there are 2 more debits cards about 5 feet away. I pick those two up... They've got the same last name. I go to a marketplace, and sit down, pull out my phone and go to craigslist, checking the lost and found section. I seen nothing, so I didnt do anything, besides put the cards and my phone into my pocket. This was about 8:15 in the morning when I found the cards. About 5:45 I went threw the same place as I found the cards, and they weren't there in the early morning.
What should I do with these cards? What would you do with them?
Do I: Call the banks and report the cards found? Hope I find the rightful owners and return them, hoping for a reward? Be a greedy P.O.S. and try using them to buy $100 in snickers? ;) lemme know

item.title: I found 3 debit cards today....?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“FizzerX637, post:12, topic:543478”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=662358.msg4427245#msg4427245 date=1401416857]
Watch out Moparisthebest may report you if you use them, he may even get on the news again!
[/quote]

Maybe if you read before posting, you’d realize I said that I called the cards in already. There is no way for me to use them.

just remember stealing is a crime and crime is for Africans.

really
thats racist[/quote]

Maybe if you read these two comments with less seriousness, you’d realize these two posts weren’t serious.

Also just throwing this out, a lot of stores these days have a limit at which you don’t even need to sign or put the pin in. At walmart and sams club you don’t have to sign or put your pin in if the transaction is under $50.

Read full topic

item.title: I found 3 debit cards today....?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I don’t know why you felt the need to create a thread for this, simple answer is you should obviously return them (with no hopes of getting a reward). How would you feel if someone found your cards and tried to rip $100 from you, for their ‘good deed’?

Read full topic

item.title: I found 3 debit cards today....?
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

I called two banks and reported them found. The first banker kept thanking me for it lol. Like 12 times.

Read full topic

item.title: I found 3 debit cards today....?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Ashi, post:4, topic:543478”]When I lose my debit card I just call the bank saying I lost it, they’ll deactivate the old one and send me a new one.
I’m guessing you’ve never had a debit card. They probably don’t even work now. Just throw it away.

If they do work because the owner didn’t report it lost and you really want to spend money from it, buy rsgp through a proxy. That way you can get your money back by selling the gold.[/quote]
^ Kinda yeah this. Usually the owners will cancel, but I’d call just in case.

Read full topic

item.title: I found 3 debit cards today....?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

When I lose my debit card I just call the bank saying I lost it, they’ll deactivate the old one and send me a new one.
I’m guessing you’ve never had a debit card. They probably don’t even work now. Just throw it away.

If they do work because the owner didn’t report it lost and you really want to spend money from it, buy rsgp through a proxy. That way you can get your money back by selling the gold.

Read full topic

item.title: I found 3 debit cards today....?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’d call the banks.

I found a debit card and called the company it was linked to. Had to go through an annoying series of menu’s, but when I got to a person and explained I found a card, they had me give the number and cancelled it n all that.

Pro tip: don’t use them to buy anything. Esp. online shit. If they were reported stolen or missing, you may get to deal with the cops.

Read full topic
